description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Tome of the Novamarines Chapter. Adds 1d5 Degrees of Success to successful Forbidden Lore (Xenos) Tests. No such tests concerning a species prviously encountered by the Imperium can suffer worse than a -10 penalty due to obscurity.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 20 R
